text:
Originally reported by: **Claudiu Popa (BitBucket: [PCManticore](http://bitbucket.org/PCManticore), GitHub: @PCManticore)**

---

We could use a convenience method for retrieving all the bindings of a nonlocal node. This will be used by the nonlocal-without-binding checker in pylint, but might be useful for other uses as well.

---
- Bitbucket: https://bitbucket.org/logilab/astroid/issue/197
title: [easy] Add Nonlocal.bindings()

text: Closing this. I don't have another use case for now, apart of the code that's in the pylint checker and we'll probably not going to need such a method soon.
